data.title: AMAZING Experience!
data.text: I really didn't know what to expect going to this my first time, but I was pleasantly surprised at the thoughtfulness that went into each and every step of this experience. From the welcoming staff to the room itself, there was not a moment I felt disappointed at all. I LOVE how the room could cater to different age groups and experience levels. I truly had a blast and recommend this to any and all! Great time!

data.title: Can't get enough
data.text: This was our second visit. Our "team" includes my son and his friend who are both 15, my 9 year old daughter, and me the mom, 40. Our "team's" first visit was in September. We beat the Vampire Room with 6 seconds remaining. It was awesome.  This visit, we did the Secret Agent 504 Room and beat it. We were so pumped that we did the Haunted Swamp Room (24% success rate) immediately afterwards. We beat that one, too! We played all three rooms by ourselves. We just asked for time slots that no one else had booked. We're completely addicted! Can't wait to tackle the Voodoo and Mardi Gras Rooms! Big thanks to GLENN of ClueCarre for making the experience unforgettable.

data.title: Super fun team bonding experience!
data.text: It definitely wasn't what I pictured. The Vampire room was not as scary as I imagined it would be. I went to Clue Carre with 9 of my co-workers/friends. Shamsher helped us through the Vampire Room. It wasn't easy, but we figured it out and escaped with a couple minutes to spare. He was funny and helpful but never made it too easy. Everyone enjoyed it, and my only complaint was that the price was a bit high. I don't think I'd go again for $30.

data.title: Secret Agent Room & Mardi Gras Den
data.text:
Fun fun fun!!! Went with a group from work and we had a blast working together to figure out the clues & would get super excited when we figured each one out!!! Inspired team work & team bonding! 

Phil & Glenn from Clue Carre were assigned to our rooms & they were a huge help in making this a fantastic experience! Highly recommend.

data.title: Mark was awesome!
data.text:
We had the best experience with Mark.  He was so much fun , attentive. Helpful and just an over all     great helper.  We will definitely be back!  He made the experience soooo much fun!  The puzzle it's self was fantastic but I may go back for my Ph D before my next session! Lol!

Missy and Katie Colllins

data.title: Fun, Fun, Fun!!
data.text: We had a group of seven who had never played this game before, with the exception of one of us.  We had such a good time together trying to figure out the clues and work together as a team to escape in time.  It was challenging enough to keep all of us engaged, and when we were stumped, we were given clues that weren't dead giveaways to help us along.  It was fun to learn everyone's strengths in working together.  I think all of us collectively will go back and play a different room again.  It was a blast.

data.title: My Dream Come True!!!
data.text: I love to play this type of escape games in muy computer and I always dream that they were real!!! So my dream come true!!! My daughter found thisi place and  invite me without telling me any clue.... I enjoyed so much and of course I will be back for more!!!

data.title: Stop the Time!!!
data.text: Group of ten women trapped in a room, all clueless but eager! It was very engaging and helped us all to see strengths in each other as we are a team at work. It was a great way to connect as a team in an unfamiliar environment. We did not escape, left eager to return to conquer a new room!! Great time!!! Wish we could have earned a few stop the clock passes...LOL.

data.title: Great fun!
data.text: We actually escaped! It was fun, and if you enjoy these types of experiences, I highly recommend it.

data.title: Great times!!
data.text: Played 2 of the rooms and love them!!  We will be back to play the other 3!  And if you are looking for more ESCAPE ROOMS try in Breakin' The Code in Houma!!  With 7 rooms to choose from you will have a great time!

data.title: Wonderful new experience!
data.text: We had reservations about partaking in this with an 11 and 8 year old, but Sham made the experience super fun and no doubt had pity on us. Even though it was our first time, we were able to play along and had a great time. Just wish we had time to go again before leaving New Orleans, since we were just getting the hang of it. Will definitely be back on the next trip. Thank you Sham and Clue Carre!

data.title: Escape game vacation!
data.text: My husband and I discovered escape rooms on out honeymoon last year and have loved playing ever since! We did all 5 rooms in 1 week, sometimes we played alone and other times with existing groups- and we loved all of them! I highly recommend this experience- my favorite was the swamp room-even though we didn't make it out!

data.title: THE GREAT ESCAPE - CLUED-IN and ESCAPED-OUT - MESSIAH MONTESSORI HIGH SCHOOL Rocks
data.text:
Great time in the Mardi Gras room with 4 MESSIAH MONTESSORI HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS (Robert, Kirstin, Maelle, and Henri) on a Field Study from Houma, Louisiana, PLUS me (Jules) and Jessica (my High School/Middle School teacher colleague), together with Veronica, our Spanish teacher (on a visa assigned by the Spanish government to our school from the Canary Islands). 
Our Team stayed focused and escaped with 10:33 left on the clock remaining. 
What did it take: Teamwork; Faith; Collaboration; Critical Thinking Skills; Inferential Thinking; Deductive Reasoning; and Focused Determination. 
Fun time!! November 4, 2016 in New Orleans, Louisiana.

data.title: Fun, fun, fun!
data.text: First attempt at escape, but it was a fun thing to do as a group.  Pay attention to the success rate on the different rooms if winning is important to you.  Jasmin and Sean took great care of us.  Do-overs are in order!

data.title: Halloween Escape
data.text: Visited with a group of friends in town for Halloween and escaped from the voodoo room. Had such a great time that we immediately came back the next day to do the swamp room.  Really good props and missions that impressed our mixed group of escape room pros and nubes. We had Matt both times and he ruled. Def recommend!

data.title: Great time with friends!
data.text: Clue Carre was a blast! We tried our skills and luck in the Swamp room... it was tough! We over thought every detail and ended up running out of time. BUT we found out that room only had a 20% success rate, so we felt much better about that. The staff was great and helpful and clearly LOVED their jobs, which made it that much more fun. We can wait to get back and visit for more and check out Escape rooms in our area.

data.title: Escaped!!
data.text: Room was very well done and the clues were definitely weaved an intense puzzle!  Did experience some difficulties working with other plays but this place was very helpful in getting the whole matter sorted out.  Great and unique experience!  Side note:  If you have enough people to fill up a group then bringing along younger players isn't a bad idea, if you are going to be mixed in with a group I wouldn't recommend younger ages as things get a little chaotic.

data.title: Birthday Celebrations
data.text: So much! I highly recommend it! Great to do with friends and family!! It takes a few minutes to get started but once your given the first clue it gets very interesting and exciting!

data.title: Haunted Swamp
data.text: We had an amazing time trying to escape. This was by far teamwork requiring creative high order thinking and problem solving. Our room advisor, Mark, gave insightful clues to assist us. Thanks for a wonderful time. The hour went by way too fast!

data.title: Awesome Team Building Event
data.text:
I booked Clue Carre as a team building event for my GMs in New Orleans. It was well-organized and our guide was awesome. Most importantly, both of our teams made it out in time!!!
Feedback from everyone was very positive. I would definitely recommend for not only team building but also for a fun night with friends or family.
